sourcesContent:
Programming books list!

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; interface Book{ name:string, author:string, img_src:string, amount:number } @Component({ selector: 'app-books', templateUrl: './books.component.html', styleUrls: ['./books.component.css'] }) export class BooksComponent { name:string = "Clean code"; author:string="Robert C"; img_src:string="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/W/WEBP_402378-T2/images/I/71UoqmNAv8L._AC_UY218_.jpg" isDisabled:boolean=false handleClick(){ console.log("hello") this.isDisabled=true } iname :string=""; handleInput(event:any){ this.iname= event.target.value } isShowing:boolean=true; toggleBook(){ this.isShowing =!this.isShowing; } books:Book[] = [{ name: "clean code", author:"Robert C", img_src:"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/W/WEBP_402378-T2/images/I/71UoqmNAv8L._AC_UY218_.jpg", amount:200 }, { name: "clean code", author:"Robert C", img_src:"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/W/WEBP_402378-T2/images/I/71UoqmNAv8L._AC_UY218_.jpg", amount:800 }, { name: "clean code", author:"Robert C", img_src:"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/W/WEBP_402378-T2/images/I/71UoqmNAv8L._AC_UY218_.jpg", amount:800 }, { name: "clean code", author:"Robert C", img_src:"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/W/WEBP_402378-T2/images/I/71UoqmNAv8L._AC_UY218_.jpg", amount:800 } ] }
